body:
@glasser, minor typo?

```diff
-So type X => other.X would be legal but type Y => other.Y would not be.
+So type X => other.X would be legal but type Y => other.X would not be.
```

For the record, I would welcome this as a restriction enforced by the "minimal" type alias proposal, which may be lifted later if desired.

Bikeshedding about syntax, I prefer `type X = other.X` over `type X => other.X`, as the `=>` token feels awkward, and `=` is already used for constants.
